title: DC because of client update
body:
This is not the first time that this would happen but during a match, the screen would go black and then it would DC me from the game. After waiting I would end up restarting my computer and when I would come back into the client, there would be an update to the client which wasn't there a few hours prior when I logged on. The several times that I have DC'd like this, there was an update to the client and I just feel that it is extremely unfair to kick me out of games, especially ranked ones, when there is an update available.

I haven't heard of this happening to anyone else but it has caused me to lose several important matches for me. And there is really nothing I can do on my end about fixing the problem because I do not control when the updates come out.

replies.body:
A legitimate update will not continuously out of a match to download. This behavior typically happens if there are some missing/corrupt files inside of your League directory, so I recommend running a [repair of your game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) and ensure you're [running the game as administrator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions#wq3)

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
